local_intent: Close gripper on white_plate with retries, execute pick using computed grasp, and verify stability.
assumptions: grasp pose 'white_plate_grasp' was computed by ComputeGraspPose earlier
coherence_with_global: Implements the CloseGripper -> Pick -> IsGraspStable segment of the global Sequence; includes an approach step and retry decorator to handle grasp failures consistent with failure_and_recovery.
